entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Creston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Creston 08:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: E 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning this afternoon. Flurries over northern sections. Snow level rising to 1200 metres this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm over northern sections. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4 except near zero over northern sections.
entry.summary: Rain except snow over northern sections late this evening and overnight. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to near valley bottom overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Temperature steady near plus 4 except near zero over northern sections. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the morning. Snow over northern sections early in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
